name: Dark Matter (itch) (Zactyl, xkinnerk)
description:
Stuck in the depths of space, you have to turn to using your own crew for fuel to make it to your destination. Will you make it before you run out of crew, or will you succumb the trials of the universe as your numbers keep dwindling down?

Created in 72 hours for Mini Jam 97.

Design: Maxwell Kinnerk + Zactyl

Art: Maxwell Kinnerk

Programming: Zactyl
